title: Introduction to Physics
description: Fundamental concepts of motion, forces, and energy.

subtopics.title: Speed
subtopics.content:
Speed is the distance travelled per unit time.

It is a scalar quantity.

subtopics.title: Velocity
subtopics.content: Velocity is the rate of change of displacement. It is a vector quantity.

subtopics.title: Newton's Laws
subtopics.content:
1. An object at rest stays at rest.
2. F = ma
3. Action = Reaction

title: Basic Mathematics
description: Core mathematical concepts used in science and everyday problem solving.

subtopics.title: Rate of Change
subtopics.content: The rate of change describes how one quantity changes in relation to another.
